name: Pathfinder
description: Elite rangers who have mastered the art of wilderness survival and developed a mystical connection with nature itself, able to navigate any terrain and commune with the very essence of the wild.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and traversal techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per 6 seconds, +3 when in natural environments
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and traversal techniques
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Resting in natural environments increases stamina regeneration rate by 400%
Depleted stamina causes penalties to movement speed and attack rate
Can channel stamina into enhanced mobility or combat techniques

resource_systems.name: Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration that enhances awareness and precision
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per minute, additional points gained through successful tracking or hunting
mechanics: Focus can be spent to enhance accuracy of attacks
Can be used to heighten senses for tracking and detection
Acts as a resource for nature magic abilities
Maximum focus increases in familiar terrain
Can be shared with animal companions to enhance their abilities

resource_systems.name: Nature's Blessing
resource_systems.description: Mystical connection to the natural world that grants special abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when in harmony with nature, decreases in corrupted or unnatural environments
mechanics: Increases by 10 when helping to restore natural balance
Increases by 5 per hour when in pristine wilderness
Decreases by 10 when harming natural environments
Decreases by 5 per hour when in heavily urbanized or corrupted areas
Can be spent to commune with nature spirits or enhance nature-based abilities

class_mechanics.name: Enhanced Hunter's Mark
class_mechanics.description: Advanced targeting that reveals critical weaknesses and enhances tracking
effects: Marked targets take significantly more damage from your attacks
Can track marked targets across any distance and through magical concealment
Gain complete insight into marked target's weaknesses and resistances
Successful attacks against marked targets restore moderate amounts of stamina
Can maintain marks on multiple targets simultaneously

class_mechanics.name: Wilderness Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Unparalleled skill at navigating and surviving in any natural environment
effects: Significantly increased movement speed in all natural environments
Immunity to environmental hazards and weather effects
Can create shelter, find food and water in even the most hostile environments
Able to identify all natural features, plants, and animals with perfect accuracy
Can temporarily alter terrain to create advantages in combat or travel

class_mechanics.name: Advanced Favored Enemy
class_mechanics.description: Comprehensive knowledge and specialized techniques against multiple enemy types
effects: Greatly increased damage against all favored enemy types
Can instantly identify weaknesses, resistances, and abilities of favored enemies
Knowledge of advanced tactics against specific creature types
Can share knowledge of favored enemies with allies, granting them bonuses
Presence causes unease in favored enemy types, reducing their combat effectiveness

class_mechanics.name: Nature Communion
class_mechanics.description: Mystical connection with the natural world that grants special insights and abilities
effects: Can communicate with plants and natural features to gather information
Able to sense disturbances in the natural order across great distances
Can temporarily borrow aspects of animals (keen senses, claws, etc.)
Presence encourages natural healing and growth in damaged environments
Can call upon nature spirits for assistance in times of need

skill_trees.name: Master Hunter
skill_trees.focus: Advanced combat techniques and prey exploitation
key_abilities: Perfect Shot: Guaranteed critical hit that ignores armor
Exploit Vital Points: Target specific body parts for devastating effects
Volley: Rain arrows down on an area, hitting all enemies within

skill_trees.name: Wayfinder
key_abilities: Ghost Step: Move without leaving any trace of passage
Nature's Path: Create temporary paths through otherwise impassable terrain
Environmental Awareness: Gain perfect knowledge of surroundings within 100 meters

skill_trees.name: Beast Lord
skill_trees.focus: Enhanced animal companionship and nature magic
key_abilities: Greater Animal Companion: Bond with multiple animals or a more powerful beast
Wild Shape: Temporarily transform into an animal form
Nature's Wrath: Channel natural energy into devastating attacks

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 5 points in any ranger skill tree
challenges: Track and hunt a legendary beast
Survive alone in the wilderness for 7 days

hero_classes.name: Warder
hero_classes.description: Pathfinders who have formed deep spiritual bonds with the natural world, becoming guardians of wilderness and protectors of the balance between civilization and nature.

hero_classes.name: Stalker
hero_classes.description: Pathfinders who have perfected the art of tracking and hunting, becoming unparalleled hunters who can pursue any prey through any terrain with relentless efficiency.

hero_classes.name: Outrider
hero_classes.description: Pathfinders who have embraced the role of merciless frontier enforcers, using their unparalleled wilderness skills to hunt down enemies and control territory through fear and superior mobility.

legendary_items.name: Bow of the Wild Hunt
effects: Arrows fired from this bow never miss marked targets
Enhanced Hunter's Mark damage increased by 30%
Can fire arrows that transform into animals mid-flight to attack from multiple angles

legendary_items.name: Cloak of the Wilderness
effects: Grants perfect camouflage in natural environments
Nature's Blessing regeneration increased by 50%
Surroundings adapt to provide cover and concealment

lore: Pathfinders represent rangers who have transcended the ordinary bounds of wilderness survival and tracking, developing a mystical connection with nature itself. Where ordinary rangers learn to live in harmony with the wild, Pathfinders become one with it, able to communicate with plants, commune with nature spirits, and navigate terrain that would be impassable to others. Their enhanced connection to the natural world grants them insights and abilities that seem magical to outsiders, allowing them to sense disturbances in the natural order across vast distances and temporarily borrow aspects of animals they've studied. Pathfinders often serve as guardians of ancient groves, protectors of endangered species, or guides through the most treacherous wilderness. Some dedicate themselves to restoring corrupted lands, while others focus on hunting creatures that threaten the natural balance. Their combat abilities are enhanced by their deeper understanding of prey behavior and anatomy, allowing them to target vital points with uncanny precision. Whether they choose to deepen their connection with animals, master the art of traversing impossible terrain, or turn their hunting skills toward darker purposes, all Pathfinders command respect from those who venture into the wild places of the world.
